solution_line_template: The total cost of the hip-hop classes is {hip_hop_classes_per_week} * ${cost_hip_hop_class} = $<<{hip_hop_classes_per_week}*{cost_hip_hop_class}={total_cost_hip_hop}>>{total_cost_hip_hop}
The total cost of the ballet classes is {ballet_classes_per_week} * ${cost_ballet_class} = $<<{ballet_classes_per_week}*{cost_ballet_class}={total_cost_ballet}>>{total_cost_ballet}
The total cost of the jazz class is {jazz_classes_per_week} * ${cost_jazz_class} = $<<{jazz_classes_per_week}*{cost_jazz_class}={total_cost_jazz}>>{total_cost_jazz}

The total cost of all of Lucia’s dance classes in one week is ${total_cost_hip_hop} + ${total_cost_ballet} + ${total_cost_jazz} = $<<{total_cost_hip_hop}+{total_cost_ballet}+{total_cost_jazz}={total_weekly_cost}>>{total_weekly_cost}
